document_data.name: Elysree's Phantom Lover
document_data.mainbody: '''''Elysree's Phantom Lover''''' was an infamous ballad about [[Harper]] [[Elysree Csimaree]] of [[Berdusk]] and a [[watchghost]] who followed her and watched over her in the Harper's travels, penned sometime in or before the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Contents: According to the ballad, Elysree Csimaree's unsleeping guardian was a benevolent watchghost. One could assume the song was not based, in fact, as Elysree Csimaree was ready to attack anyone uttering a single note of the song or even humming it in their presence.
